objective: Provide 10 genre‑agnostic writing prompts around motif **{motif}**, each ≤25 words, designed to spark character‑driven stories.
STYLE: minimalistic, strong final image.
Rewrite the dialogue segment **{dialogue}** to heighten subtext and pacing while keeping word count ±10%.
Generate 3 deep internal conflicts for character **{character_name}** that align with the archetype **{archetype}** and drive plot tension.
Transform synopsis **{synopsis}** into a gripping 150‑word blurb with hook, stakes, and teaser question.
FOCUS: show, don’t tell.
INCLUDE: chapter titles, one‑sentence cliffhanger per chapter, and dominant theme. FRAMEWORK: Freytag’s Pyramid.
Compose a **{form}** poem on **{theme}** employing at least one example each of alliteration, enjambment, and internal rhyme.
Describe a fantastical city famed for **{unique_feature}** in 200 words, focusing on architecture, culture, and atmosphere.
Propose two alternative endings for the story scenario **{scenario}**, each ≤250 words and exploring divergent themes.
Design a formative assessment to gauge understanding of **{lesson_objective}** using exit tickets.
Draft 8 open‑ended questions for **{literary_work}** connecting text to modern societal issues.
Explain **{complex_concept}** to a 10‑year‑old using analogies and visuals description.
Condense chapter **{chapter_text}** into a one‑page study guide with key terms, concepts, and memory hooks.
Create assessment rubric for project on **{topic}** at grade **{grade_level}** with 4 criteria and 4 proficiency levels.
Generate 10 multiple‑choice questions assessing **{concept}** with answers and brief explanations.
Suggest strategies for learners struggling with **{skill}** across visual, auditory, kinesthetic modalities.
Provide feedback on student essay **{essay_text}** focusing on thesis clarity, evidence, and mechanics.
Propose 3 interactive online activities to teach **{concept}**, specifying tools and engagement metric.
Create a 4‑week lesson plan to teach **{subject}** to **{level}** students incorporating Bloom’s Taxonomy.
SPECIFY: chart types, key message of each, and sequencing rationale.
Compose a 500‑word narrative weaving together three insights from **{analysis_summary}** for an internal newsletter.
Draft a Python pandas pipeline to handle missing and erroneous values in **{dataset_name}**, with code comments.
Suggest methods to increase transparency of a random forest predicting **{outcome}**, including surrogate models and visualization.
Recommend top 3 ML models for predicting **{target}** given features **{feature_list}**, citing pros/cons and interpretability.
Summarize SHAP values output **{shap_output}** into plain‑language insights and next‑step recommendations.
DELIVERABLE: Ordered task list with justification.
Explain confusion matrix **{matrix_values}** for stakeholders focusing on precision, recall, and business impact.
CONSIDER: efficient window functions.
Interpret experiment results **{ab_results}** computing lift, p‑value, and recommending rollout decision.
List at least 5 revenue streams for **{business_model}** estimating TAM, SAM, SOM for each.
Map a 6‑month GTM plan for **{product}** in **{region}** detailing channels, KPIs, and resource allocation.
Recommend three pricing tiers for SaaS **{product}** targeting **{segment}**, including feature bundling and psychological pricing cues.
Outline 10‑slide pitch deck for startup solving **{pain_point}** with **{solution}**, specifying key data points per slide.
Compile a SWOT analysis for **{company}** entering **{market}** with emphasis on AI‑driven disruption factors.
Draft an outreach email to **{partner_company}** proposing collaboration with clear mutual benefit and next steps.
Draft OKRs for Q3 for team handling **{goal_area}**, including measurable key results and confidence ratings.
Suggest 5 KPIs to measure success of **{initiative}** with definition, formula, and target benchmark.
Draft a complete business model canvas for idea **{idea}**, including evidence‑based assumptions and risk rating.
Produce a competitor matrix comparing **{company}** to **{competitors}** across 5 critical dimensions (price, features, market share, funding, differentiation).
Produce a pillar blog post outline (minimum 3,000 words) on **{topic}** targeting **{persona}** that will rank top‑3 for the keyword cluster **{keyword_cluster}**.
Rewrite the following landing‑page hero section **{text}** to achieve a Flesch Reading Ease > 60 and raise emotional appeal.
Generate 12 probing interview questions for **{expert_role}** on **{topic}**.

GUIDELINES: • Twitter: 2‑tweet thread, each ≤260 chars, includes a statistic and a question. • LinkedIn: 120‑word mini‑essay, uses storytelling CTA. • Instagram: Caption ≤150 words plus 3 hashtag suggestions. Ensure brand voice consistency and add an emoji only on Instagram.
INCLUDE: • 100‑word episode summary • Timestamped highlights (mm:ss – key takeaway) at 2‑minute granularity • Guest bio (50 words) and two social links • Three pull‑quotes formatted for Twitter

TASKS: • List 5 highest‑value keyword gaps with search volume. • Rate title tag, meta description, H1‑H3 hierarchy, and internal links (score /10 each). • Suggest improvements with before/after snippets.
Validate the factual claims in **{article_text}** and supply APA 7th citations for each.
Draft a 400‑word weekly digest for **{brand}** summarizing the three most impactful events in **{sector}**.

STRUCTURE PER EMAIL: 1️⃣ Subject line (<45 chars, Title Case) 2️⃣ Opening hook (≤30 words) 3️⃣ Story segment employing the Hero's Journey framework 4️⃣ CTA with urgency cue. Ensure cohesion across emails and measurable progression of reader commitment (curiosity → desire → action).
Craft a 1,200‑word editorial on **{topic}** for **{publication}** that translates complex AI developments into layman's terms while maintaining expert depth.
Recommend three strategies to reduce RAM usage in **{language}** application processing large arrays **{use_case}**.

INCLUDE: edge cases and parameterized tests.

Create contract stating **{commitment}** with penalty, reward, and weekly review clause.
Design monthly budget template to save **{amount}** while paying debt, includes income, fixed, variable, and sinking funds.
Suggest app stack based on **{preferences}** covering task management, note‑taking, and focus tracking.
Suggest morning routine improving **{habit}** with stacking strategy, scientific rationale, and progress tracker.
Write button component guidelines for **{framework}** design system including states, spacing, and naming convention.
Apply Nielsen heuristics to audit **{interface}**, scoring each criterion and summarizing top 3 issues.
Provide recommendations to improve contrast and navigability of **{page_url}** to meet WCAG 2.2 AA.

Suggest 3 delightful micro‑interactions for onboarding flow in **{app}** detailing trigger, feedback, and purpose.

Write signup form microcopy encouraging account creation on **{app}**, covering headline, placeholder, and error states.
Recommend color palette for **{industry}** brand aiming to evoke **{emotion}**, with HEX codes and accessibility contrast ratio.
Draft plan for testing **{feature}** with 5 participants, including tasks, success metrics, and post‑test interview script.

RETURN: Revised text + bullet note explaining changes (structure, synonyms, syntax).
Create a thematic literature map for **{topic}** using sources post‑2021 only.
INCLUDE: variable operationalization, suitable statistical tests (with assumptions), effect size metrics, and robustness checks.
SECTIONS: Background | Methods | Results | Conclusion | Implications, each 2‑3 sentences.
STRUCTURE: Major Comments (≥3) | Minor Comments (≥3) | Recommendation summary. TONE: Courteous, evidence‑backed.
Condense **{long_abstract}** to 300 words without losing key findings and ensuring clear contribution statement.
FORMAT: Plain English summary, key takeaway bullets, and limitations.
INCLUDE: consent procedure, risk mitigation, data privacy measures, and IRB compliance statement.
INCLUDE: knowledge gap identification, theoretical framework (≤150 words), and testable hypothesis statement.

Generate 20 long‑tail keywords around **{topic}** with search volume, CPC, and intent categorization.
